title: 94/191/EC, Euratom: Commission Decision of 18 March 1994 amending Decision 90/177/Euratom, EEC authorizing Belgium not to take into account certain categories of transactions and to use certain approximate estimates for the calculation of the VAT own resources base (Only the Dutch and French texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 18 March 1994 amending Decision 90/177/Euratom, EEC authorizing Belgium not to take into account certain categories of transactions and to use certain approximate estimates for the calculation of the VAT own resources base  (Only the Dutch and French texts are authentic) (94/191/EC, Euratom)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Article 2 (3) of Decision 90/177/Euratom, EEC is hereby repealed in respect of transactions conducted with effect from 1 September 1992.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 March 1994.
For the Commission
Peter SCHMIDHUBER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 155, 7. 6. 1989, p. 9.
(2) OJ No L 145, 13. 6. 1977, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 226, 3. 8. 1989, p. 21.
(4) OJ No L 99, 19. 4. 1990, p. 24.
